General.Name: Anadolu Anonim Turk Sigorta Sti
General.Description: Anadolu Anonim Türk Sigorta Sirketi engages in the provision of non-life insurance products in Turkey. The company primarily offers fire, transport, accident, engineering, agriculture, legal protection, and credit insurance products. It also provides traffic, motor, green card, and motorcycle insurance, as well as home, health, personal accident, and travel insurance products. In addition, the company offers pet insurance products covering cats and dogs; phone; cyber security; and yacht insurance products. Further, it provides commercial and corporate insurance products comprising workplace and SME, liability, and aviation insurance. The company was founded in 1925 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Anadolu Anonim Türk Sigorta Sirketi operates as a subsidiary of Millî Reasürans Türk Anonim Sirketi.
General.Address: Rüzgarlibahçe Mah. Çam Pinari Sok. No: 6, Istanbul, Turkey, 34805
